projects.introduction: I maintain a long list of projects that I someday wish to complete, including a variety of applications, servers and tools. In an effort to keep this list organised, I am documenting my past, current and future projects, in chronological order, on this page.

current.name: Website
current.description: This website was initially created to store a public listing of the projects I was working on, but now serves several other purposes. A nice side effect is that it gave me the opportunity to work with lots of new technologies and frameworks that I had wanted to play with, such as angular and grunt.

past.name: VPN Server
past.description: I set up a VPN server using a raspberry pi connected to my home network. This allowed me to work on my website from outside the house without allowing public ssh access to the web server. I also use it to provide more secure internet access when using public networks.

future.name: Backups
future.description: I want to write some backup software that will run on a Raspberry Pi connected to some hard drives. It should be simple enough to use that a non technical user could set it up with their own raspberry pi, providing an alternative solution to commercial cloud backup software.
